oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: German Postcard, "Aufgenommen von Ihrer Majestät der Kaiserin und Königin im Juli 1915"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This German postcard shows Kaiser Wilhelm II and Field Marshal Paul von Hindenburg as photographed by the Empress of Germany. The photograph was taken just after the Gorlice-Tanrow Offensive, which pushed the Russians back 100 miles. The postcard was sold as a fund raiser for the German Red Cross. Wilhelm held both the title of Emperor of Germany and King of Prussia. His empress and queen was Augusta Victoria of Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Augustenburg.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Albert, Frederich Wilhelm Viktor; von Hindenburg, Paul
